document_data.name: Field glass
document_data.mainbody: A '''field glass''' was a popular export from the [[Shining Lands]] in [[1367 DR]]. It was available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.
document_data.Description: Field glasses were used to magnify the user's vision over great distances. A field glass typically at least doubled the distance vision of any scout or lookout.
document_data.History:
A field glass was made by attaching special lenses, shaped by [[gnome]] artificers in [[Ormpe]], to either end of a cylinder.

Field glasses were coveted by captains sailing both the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] and the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.Reputation: They were extremely popular among sailors on the [[Great Sea]], allowing them to spot pirates long before the pirates even knew they were there.
document_data.Notable Field Glasses: *''[[Squint]]'': an enchanted spyglass with [[lenses]] carved out of [[gem]]s that belonged to [[Calliope]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
